snippet.title: Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks 405: Shadow of Chaos (SAGE2005)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Shadow of Chaos - Demo
Credit: Blazefire Productions (BlazeHedgehog)
Release Date: July 3rd, 2005

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.

00:00:00 - Uber Launcher
00:00:48 - Tutorial
00:06:25 - Boot&Stuff (Amazon Demo)
00:06:37 - Intro&Title
00:08:23 - Green Amazon by Jackelbeaver
00:14:03 - Intro&Title (Xmas)
00:16:09 - Christmas Hill
00:21:10 - Ending
00:23:56 - Wvrooom!
00:24:38 - Game Over

(EXTRA)
00:24:48 - Iced Cocktail Zone by RedFox34
00:28:27 - Untitled Zone by ?
00:34:18 - First Stage Contest Version by Blazefire
00:38:09 - Final Factory by ?
00:45:18 - Versus Knuckles by Jackelbeaver
00:46:13 - Matrixx5 by Matrixx & Blazefire
00:50:00 - Neon Highrise (Possibly by Jackelbeaver)
00:52:48 - Electronic Citadel (Possibly by Jackelbeaver)
00:54:52 - Casino Zone by Nik Jam
00:57:24 - Test Level by Blazefire
00:58:50 - Versus Clones by Blazefire
01:00:12 - Utitled Quick Zone by Blazefire
01:02:04 - Versus Sonic by Jackelbeaver
01:03:37 - That Dam Meow & Boss by Meowtwo/Shenaniganza aka (Fiddlesticks - Shenanimation)

NOTES: That one Xmas morning to everyone's surprise.
Their fangames have vanished into thin air!
Shadow having made his appearence laughed Ho-Ho-Ho!
"It is I who took your precious fangames!"
He stated that as he was pleased with that accomplishment.
"But it's a part of Sonic fan game history! You cannot do that!"
Furious were the kids for Shadow having taken their games.
"Shut it! They are a load of crap anyway!"
"I'm doing you all a favor!"
Shadow angrily said to the ungrateful kids.
"On Xmas we can all come together and appreciate the modern times!"
"And pay extra for release day DLC's! And support $$$ schemes!"
Little did he know that his plans have failed for I gave the kids their present!
A fangame called "Shadow of Chaos"

Cough... Okay enough of that, so here we have a Shadow game.
Originally built by BlazeHedgehog and he held a contest on SAGE for this game.
Releasing the Engine that he managed to stich together he had various people make levels.
And here are those levels.
I do think this game is interesting has some funny cutscenes and interesting music choices.
But the physics could seriously use some work, camera could work better and Shadow is too slippery.
If the levels were polished a bit more same for the controls/physics, this would be a fun little game for sure.
As in it's current state it's a bit rough around the edges.
Overall I do kinda like it after getting used to it.
